pageTitle: House Budget Committee 110th Congress (2008 cycle): Member Money | OpenSecrets
textBeforeTable: See member profile] [ Totals by Sector to Rodney Alexander (R-La) Since legislative decisions made by this committee affect a broad range of industries and interest groups more or less equally, the charts offer a general, graphic take on which sectors gave. The contribution totals listed here refer to the total dollars received by that member from all industries.
